description: Kyoko Sasagawa is a girl Tsuna has a crush on, and is in the same grade as him. She is somewhat air headed, and thinks all the events surrounding Tsuna are part of a game. Nonetheless, she is very kind-hearted and cheerful, and loves her older brother Ryohei, whom she often worries about. She, along with Haru, often enjoys babysitting Lambo and I-Pin.
name: Sasagawa Kyouko
